message.body: Hello! Hope you're well this morning. Dunno how much time i'll have to chat.
Incidentally I think we chatted yesterday
To answer your question from last night, my Memorial Day was very nice. We spent a lot of time with family this weekend. How was your weekend?
Yes, we did chat yesterday! Looks like the bot is consistently giving me the same person 2 days in a row.
We went to Sturbridge Village yesterday. Are you familiar with it?
No is it in the Philadelphia area?
It's in central Massachusetts. Historical workibg muuseum, replica of 1830s town. Bit over hour's drive for us.
Very cool! I'm a total history nerd.
